public class Scoreboard
extends greenfoot.Actor

Scoreboard for CSC14400 Project #1 (Spring 2018) Although you may modify this code, doing such is HIGHLY inadvisable.

Constructor Detail

Scoreboard

public Scoreboard()
Constructor for objects of class Scoreboard. By default, a scoreboard has a score and highScore of 0, a life left of 100, and a traps left of 3.

Method Detail

addedToWorld

protected void addedToWorld(greenfoot.World w)
after a Scoreboard is added to world, this method is automatically called. In this case, it builds this Scoreboard's image to match the width of the world this Scoreboard object was placed into.
